cgi.router



interface ROUTE;
interface ROUTE

interface class that allows you to create classes to be used with the ROUTER class.

abstract void run(CGI cgi);
main method that will perform the actions/purpose of your class.

class ROUTER;
class ROUTER

Description:
handle path_info or CGI query string information to logically determine a cgi application flow control. This class allows you use develop a restful api, and then serve up content based upon the path_info or CGI query string information. IE. "/foo/" or "?func=foo"

bool runRoute(string path, ROUTE route);
run a route based off the path_info envirement variable

returns true if the a cgi.PATH_INFO starts with the path variable

bool runQueryRoute(string name, ROUTE route);
Run a route based off if a cgi variable exists in a query string.

returns true if the name variable exists in the cgi query string.
